text: Jonckheere was a Belgian motor coach and bus builder. It was founded in 1881 by Henri Jonckheere in Roeselare. ==History== In 1881, Henri Jonckheere started building horse-drawn carriages in the village of Beveren, near Roeselare, West Flanders, Belgium. In 1902 Henri Jonckheere made his first luxury automobile. In 1922, Henri's son, Joseph Jonckheere, made his first body of a bus. In the 1930s, Jonckheere stopped making automobiles and only made bus and motor coach bodies. In 1994, Berkhof Groep purchased Jonckheere. In 1997, the company changed its name from Berkhof Groep to Berkhof Jonckheere Groep In 1998 it was bought by the VDL Groep, It changed its name from Berkhof Jonckheere Groep to VDL Jonckheere. In 2010, VDL Jonckheere, VDL Bova and VDL Berkhof were merged into one company called VDL Bus & Coach. ==Products== * Bermuda * Jubilee * Deauville * Monaco * Arrow 30, 50, 70 * Mistral 30, 50, 70 * SHV * JHV * Modulo ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:Bus manufacturers of Belgium Category:Companies based in West Flanders Category:Roeselare Category:VDL Groep Category:Vehicle manufacturing companies established in 1881 Category:2010 disestablishments in Belgium Category:Belgian companies established in 1881 Category:Coachbuilders
title: Jonckheere
